sqlMap.select: $option$ select intBscId,nmParentId,nmGroupId,intRaitype,count(distinct(nmImsi)), #intYear#,#intWeek#,getdate(),#vcLocalIP# ,count(distinct(case when intUserBelongId=1 then nmimsi else 0 end)) from ftbStatNewBussNetSpaceHourUsers_week sourceTable left join dtbGroupTree tree on sourceTable.nmDimensId = tree.nmDimensId where nmTypeId = 1 and nmLevelsId = 2 and intYear = #intYear# and intWeek = #intWeek# group by intBscId,nmParentId,nmGroupId,intRaitype

$option$ select intBscId,tree.nmDimensId,nmGroupId,intRaitype,count(distinct(nmImsi)), #intYear#,#intWeek#,getdate(),#vcLocalIP# ,count(distinct(case when intUserBelongId=1 then nmimsi else 0 end)) from ftbStatNewBussNetSpaceHourUsers_week sourceTable left join dtbGroupTree tree on sourceTable.nmDimensId = tree.nmDimensId where nmTypeId = 1 and intYear = #intYear# and intWeek = #intWeek# group by intBscId,tree.nmDimensId,nmParentId,nmGroupId,intRaitype
